File: jQuery.coffee

Defined in: coffee/adapters

Variables Summary

DATA_NAME = 
'epoch-chart'

Data key to use for storing a reference to the chart instance on an element.

Method Summary

  • ~ (Object) jQuery.fn.epoch(options) Adds an Epoch chart of the given type to the referenced element.

Method Details

~ (Object) jQuery.fn.epoch(options)

Adds an Epoch chart of the given type to the referenced element.

Parameters:

  • options ( Object ) — Options for the chart.

Options Hash: (options):

  • type ( String ) — The type of chart to append to the referenced element.

Returns:

  • ( Object ) — The chart instance that was associated with the containing element.
